      Return a Resource in m who's URI is based on ru, but with the _page parameter removed (for an item endpoint) or updated to page (for a list endpoint).

      • adjustPageParameter

        public static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource adjustPageParameter(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m,
                                                     URI ru,
                                                     boolean isListEndpoint,
                                                     int page)
        Return a Resource in m who's URI is based on ru, but with the _page parameter removed (for an item endpoint) or updated to page (for a list endpoint).

      • withoutPageParameters

        public static URI withoutPageParameters(URI ru)
        Return a URI based on ru with any _page or _pageSize query settings removed.
